TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit AssemblyKeyFileAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class AssemblyKeyFileAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class AssemblyKeyFileAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 指定包含用于生成强名称的密钥对的文件的名称。

span.span: Specifies the name of a file containing the key pair used to generate a strong name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 作者在生成的强名称程序集时，必须提供此特性或。When building a strong-named assembly, the author must supply either this attribute or . 如果还已指定，很可能此文件将仅包含公钥。If has also been specified, it is likely that this file will only contain the public key. 语法的一个示例是`[assembly:AssemblyKeyFileAttribute("myKey.snk")]`。An example of the syntax is `[assembly:AssemblyKeyFileAttribute("myKey.snk")]`. > [!CAUTION] > 由于仍存在的路径和文件名称，确保与所使用的字符串`AssemblyKeyFileAttribute`不包含敏感信息。Since the path and file name persist, ensure that the string you use with `AssemblyKeyFileAttribute` does not contain sensitive information. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性与。The following code example shows the use of the attribute with the . 若要编译此示例中，必须创建名为 TestPublicKey.snk 使用一个强名称密钥文件[Sn.exe （强名称工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/sn-exe-strong-name-tool.md):To compile this example, you must create a strong-name key file named TestPublicKey.snk using the [Sn.exe (Strong Name Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/sn-exe-strong-name-tool.md): ```console sn -k TestPublicKey.snk ``` 将示例编译为.dll。Compile the example as a .dll. 如果从命令行编译时，使用`/t:library`选项适用于 C# 或 Visual Basic 中，或`/LD`Visual c + + 链接器选项。If you compile from the command line, use the `/t:library` option for C# or Visual Basic, or the `/LD` linker option for Visual C++. [!code-cpp[AssemblyDelaySignattribute#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyDelaySignAttribute/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AssemblyDelaySignattribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyDelaySignAttribute/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AssemblyDelaySignattribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyDelaySignAttribute/vb/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string keyFile) cil managed

param.name: keyFile
param.span: 包含密钥对的文件的名称。

span.span: The name of the file containing the key pair.

summary.span: 使用文件的名称初始化 类的新实例，该文件包含为正在属性化的程序集生成强名称的密钥对。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the name of the file containing the key pair to generate a strong name for the assembly being attributed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 没有默认路径为构造函数。There is no default path for the constructor. 构造函数设置的值解释由链接器，或由[!INCLUDE[vsprvsext](~/includes/vsprvsext-md.md)]，调用链接器。The value set by the constructor is interpreted by the linker, or by [!INCLUDE[vsprvsext](~/includes/vsprvsext-md.md)], that invokes the linker. 默认设置为[Al.exe （程序集链接器）](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md)工具假定的密钥文件位于当前目录。The default setting for the [Al.exe (Assembly Linker)](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md) tool assumes that the key file is in the current directory. 在[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]，Visual Basic 和 Visual C# 编译器生成并链接到项目目录的子目录，这样如果密钥文件置于项目目录的相对路径可能是"...\\..\keyfile.snk"...在 Visual Basic 中的 \keyfile.snk"或"...\\\\..\\\keyfile.snk"...\\\keyfile.snk"C# 中。In [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], the Visual Basic and Visual C# compilers build and link to subdirectories of the project directory, so if you put the key file in the project directory the relative path might be "..\\..\keyfile.snk" or "..\keyfile.snk" in Visual Basic, or "..\\\\..\\\keyfile.snk" or "..\\\keyfile.snk" in C#. 对于 C# 中，可以在项目属性中设置此属性。For C#, this attribute can be set in the project properties. > [!CAUTION] > 因为仍存在的路径和文件名称，确保与所使用的字符串`AssemblyKeyFileAttribute`不包含敏感信息。Because the path and file name persist, ensure that the string you use with `AssemblyKeyFileAttribute` does not contain sensitive information.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property KeyFile As String
public: property System::String ^ KeyFile { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取文件的名称，该文件包含用于为属性化程序集生成强名称的密钥对。

span.span: Gets the name of the file containing the key pair used to generate a strong name for the attributed assembly.

value.span: 包含密钥对所在文件的名称的字符串。

span.span: A string containing the name of the file that contains the key pair.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!CAUTION] > 因为仍存在的路径和文件名称，确保与所使用的字符串`AssemblyKeyFileAttribute`不包含敏感信息。Because the path and file name persist, ensure that the string you use with `AssemblyKeyFileAttribute` does not contain sensitive information.
